column5: After not fishing for almost a week I had some free time this morning so I decided to head down to the river.In 2 hours I managed to catch 7 bass all around this size.   I was trying for carp and finally hooked into this guy.I tried using the timer on the camera as I was alone but I guess he was camera shy.While I am holding him for the first pic he started flopping and was hard to hold as you can tell by my face.   I was just getting ready to leave when this little guy hit.  Not bad for a couple of hours I guess.Was good to get out and catch something again.
that's very good for a couple of hours.
When I can't get out on the boat there is nothing better then getting down to the Grand! Great shots.
Didn't know you played football.... ohh, they're carp.
Ahh you gotta love carp. They never let you down.
nice catch, smallies and carp sure are fun to catch
Nice catch - you got a great fishing spot there.  Keep up the good work.  007
Be honest, the smallie are really cute
Great report..and you did very well for just a few hours!  You have a little gold mine in your backyard there...always enjoy your reports!
Father of 3 and no fishing for less than a week?......As my Newfie in-laws say "you poor slut" (just kidding of course)  Nice catch. The grand has no shortage of carp, catfish, sheepshead etc.
